review: I absolutely love my Amazon Fire TV. Had it for awhile and thought I would need someone more hookup savy than me to help me set up so it sat.I finally buckled down out of shame to set it up so I pulled up a youtube video on set up and followed it, though the given instructions were the same but I thought there had to be more to it. Hooked it up with just one purchased cable required and synced and downloaded which only took maybe 2 minutes and ready to go. Easy navigation and voice Que work worked great.downloaded HULU, Netflix, Pandora and Amazon Prime is already in unit. HD is stunning and full screen on most programs and gave my 8 year old Daughter about 2 minute instructional and she had it down no problem. I can' speak of the gaming quality but plan on getting game controller. An impressive bonus is the screen saver which is a slide show of stunning landscapes from around the world which my Daughter and I often just let roll through for fun. Really breathtaking scenes in HD. If your on Prime than this is fantastic deal.
